title: Got verbally abused, muted player, got him on team 3 times in a row!
body:
Well played riot WELL PLAYED!

match making OP

replies.body: STFU, Why would you blame riot for this?. Its your KARMA :P....

based on his match history, he didnt play Karma
I think it is because of his name #askingForIt
And you never once thought to take a 3-5 minute break so that you wouldn't be in the same queue as him?
